title: Cant entre a game :\
body:
First of all Sorry for writing this Thread on the general discussion :)
well my game had an issue since patch 6.16 that always when i come to loading screen in any game my % stay 0% and my MS is normal like 95 or something and the game dont start ... just DC and saying check your internet connection ... i repaired the patcher but the same thing happens ..
Anyone knows how to solve this ?

replies.body:
It sounds like your client is unable to establish a stable connection to the game server. This is most likely caused by local network settings that conflict with League, so I recommend working through our [connection guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to address these.

Let me know if you notice any changes after working through those steps.
